org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.impl.rules

Interface FileContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileContextImpl

    public interface FileContext
    Represents a file and an optional root directory for context

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      File getFile()
      The file name itself
      File getRoot()
      Root directory of a hierarchy, may be null
      boolean isIgnored()
      Boolean flag that denotes if the context lives on a file path that is currently marked ignored by the rules.
      void setIgnored(boolean ignored) 

    • Method Detail

      • getRoot

        File getRoot()
        Root directory of a hierarchy, may be null
        Returns:
        The file representing the root of the file.

      • getFile

        File getFile()
        The file name itself
        Returns:
        The file representing the file context.

      • isIgnored

        boolean isIgnored()
        Boolean flag that denotes if the context lives on a file path that is currently marked ignored by the rules.
        Returns:
        True if the file path is ignored, false otherwise

      • setIgnored

        void setIgnored(boolean ignored)
